content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>VT Center for Geographic Information</origin> <pubdate>20090915</pubdate> <pubtime>unknown</pubtime> <title>VTORTHO_0_5M_PAN_2008</title> <edition>2008A</edition> <geoform>raster digital data</geoform> <serinfo> <sername>VT orthos (2008) - 1:5000 (0.5 meter) black and white (pan)</sername> <issue>2008A</issue> </serinfo> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Waterbury VT 05676</pubplace> <publish>VT Center for Geographic Information</publish> </pubinfo> <othercit>Tile Structure - ORTHO</othercit> <onlink>http://www.vcgi.org/dataware/default.cfm?datasetname=VTORTHO_0_5M_PAN_2008</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract> The VTORTHO_0_5M_PAN_2008 data includes pancromatic (black and white) orthophotography (orthophoto) at 1:5000 scale (0.5 meter cell resolution). The imagery was acquired in May of 2008 covering portions of Grand Isle, Franklin, and Orleans Counties. Imagery was captured on April 24 (lines 1-12) and May 7 (lines 13-23), 2008. </abstract> <purpose>Provide leaf-off imagery for Vermont to support mapping efforts.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>200805</caldate> <time>Unknown</time> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Ground Conditions</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>Irregular</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-73.36</westbc> <eastbc>-71.95</eastbc> <northbc>44.66</northbc> <southbc>44.26</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>imageryBaseMapsEarthCover</themekey> </theme> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>orthophotograpy</themekey> <themekey>ortho</themekey> <themekey>imagery</themekey> <themekey>aerial photo</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>Geographic Names Information System</placekt> <placekey>VT</placekey> <placekey>Grand Isle</placekey> <placekey>Franklin</placekey> <placekey>Orleans</placekey> </place> <temporal> <tempkt>None</tempkt> <tempkey>2008</tempkey> </temporal> </keywords> <accconst>VCGI and the State of VT make no representations of any kind, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular use, nor are any such warranties to be implied with respect to the data.</accconst> <useconst>For all products, services, Internet Website, and data, excepting digital or hardcopy orthophotography collected through the VT Tax Department\ufffd\ufffds Mapping Program, the direct, non-value added, reproduction of State of Vermont or VCGI\ufffd\ufffds products, services, Website, or data with intent to sell is prohibited without the written consent of VCGI.  For all digital or hardcopy orthophotography collected through the VT Tax Department\ufffd\ufffds Mapping Program, copying, reprinting, duplicating, selling or attempting to sell is prohibited.  Vermont Statute 32 V.S.A. \ufffd\ufffd 3409 permits a fine, not to exceed $1,000.00, for any person violating this prohibition.</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>VT Center for Geographic Information</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>Mailing and Physical Address</addrtype> <address>58 South Main Street, Suite 2</address> <city>Waterbury</city> <state>VT</state> <postal>05676</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>802/882-3000</cntvoice> <cnttdd>None</cnttdd> <cntfax>802/882-3001</cntfax> <cntemail>info@vcgi.org</cntemail> <hours>9am - 5pm, M-F</hours> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <datacred>Vermont Mapping Program (VMP)</datacred> <secinfo> <secsys>N/A</secsys> <secclass>Unclassified</secclass> <sechandl>No Security Considerations</sechandl> </secinfo> <native>Arc/Info</native> </idinfo> <dataqual> <logic>The data has been reviewed by Dewberry and Davis for logical consistency.</logic> <complete>The data has been checked for completeness by Dewberry and Davis.</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar> The data is produced to meet National Map Accuracy Standards (NMAS) for imagery at a 1:5,000-scale (1" = 416.7'), i.e., Accuracy = 18.75 ft at the 95% confidence level when expressed in terms used by the National Standard for Spatial Data Accuracy (NSSDA). </horizpar> </horizpa> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srccite> <citeinfo> <origin>Pinnacle Mapping Technologies, Inc.</origin> <pubdate>20080501</pubdate> <title>2008 State of Vermont Orthophotography</title> <geoform>raster digital data</geoform> </citeinfo> </srccite> <srcscale>2750</srcscale> <typesrc>Aerial Photography</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <rngdates> <begdate>20080424</begdate> <enddate>20080507</enddate> </rngdates> </timeinfo> <srccurr>Ground Condition</srccurr> </srctime> <srccitea>Orthophotography</srccitea> <srccontr>Dewberry, Air Photographics and Pinnacle Mapping Technologies</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc> 1.  Photography acquired by Air Photographics, Inc.  Imagery was captured on April 24 (lines 1-12) and May 7 (lines 13-23), 2008. 2.  Film processed by Air Photographics, Inc. 3.  Film Inspected by Pinnacle Mapping Technologies, Inc. 4.  Film cleaned and scanned by Pinnacle Mapping. 5.  Ground control coordinates received from the State of Vermont. 6.  Fully analytical aerial triangulation solution computed by Pinnacle Mapping. 7.  New DEM to support orthorectification compiled by Pinnacle Mapping. 8.  Raw Orthos Created by Pinnacle Mapping. 9.  Seamlines drawn by Pinnacle Mapping. 10.  Final tiles mosaicked by Pinnacle Mapping. 11.  Data reviewed for errors by Dewberry & Davis. </procdesc> <procdate>20080501</procdate> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Dave Maune, PhD., C.P.</cntper> <cntorg>Dewberry & Davis</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>8401 Arlington Blvd.</address> <city>Fairfax</city> <state>Virginia</state> <postal>22031</postal> <country>United States</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>(703) 849-0396</cntvoice> <cntfax>(703) 849-0182</cntfax> <cntemail>DMaune@dewberry.com</cntemail> <hours>M-F</hours> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> <procstep> <procdesc> Imagery was acquired by contractor.  VCGI Imagery Program (VIP) QAQCed the imagery and flagged errors.  Contractor corrected errors as needed. </procdesc> <procdate>20090815</procdate> <proctime>Unknown</proctime> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>VIP Administrator</cntper> <cntorg>VCGI</cntorg> </cntperp> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> <procstep> <procdesc> VCGI reorganized and renamed image files, created JPEG2000 version, created metadata, and posted everything to the VCGI Image Library (VIL). </procdesc> <procdate>20090915</procdate> <proctime>Unknown</proctime> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Steve Sharp</cntper> <cntorg>VCGI</cntorg> </cntperp> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> </lineage> <cloud>0%</cloud> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>Raster</indspref> <direct>Raster</direct> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <planar> <gridsys> <gridsysn>State Plane Coordinate System</gridsysn> <spcs> <spcszone>4400</spcszone> <transmer> <sfctrmer>0.999964</sfctrmer> <longcm>-72.500000</longcm> <feast>500000.000000</feast> <fnorth>0.000000</fnorth> </transmer> </spcs> </gridsys> <planci> <plance>coordinate pair</plance> <coordrep> <absres>0.500000</absres> <ordres>0.500000</ordres> </coordrep> <plandu>meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>North American Datum of 1983</horizdn> <ellips>Geodetic Reference System 80</ellips> <semiaxis>6378137</semiaxis> <denflat>1 / 298.25722210</denflat> </geodetic> </horizsys> </spref> <eainfo></eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>VT Center for Geographic Information</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>Mailing and Physical Address</addrtype> <address>58 South Main Street, Suite 2</address> <city>Waterbury</city> <state>VT</state> <postal>05676</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>802/882-3000</cntvoice> <cnttdd>None</cnttdd> <cntfax>802/882-3001</cntfax> <cntemail>info@vcgi.org</cntemail> <hours>9am - 5pm, M-F</hours> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>VTORTHO_0_5M_PAN_2008</resdesc> <distliab>VCGI and the State of Vermont make no representations of any kind, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular use, nor are any such warranties to be implied with respect to the data.</distliab> <stdorder> <digform> <digtinfo> <formname>JPEG2000 and GeoTIFF</formname> <formspec>JPEG2000 (20x compression) and GeoTIFF</formspec> <formcont>geospatial data</formcont> <filedec>Image viewer</filedec> </digtinfo> <digtopt> <onlinopt> <computer> <networka> <networkr>http://www.vcgi.org/dataware/default.cfm?datasetname=VTORTHO_0_5M_PAN_2008</networkr> </networka> </computer> <accinstr> Download compressed (JPEG2000) from web site.
